Key Match Events: India won by 6 wickets (with 52 balls remaining)
Rahul, Kohli guide India home after early scare on tricky track
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma: 'This is the biggest event I'll be a part of'
Kumble: KL Rahul looks like he's back to his original self
Moody: Role clarity is important and India are right in sticking to Rahul in the middle order
Miscellaneous Highlights: Stat alert: India's 2/3 is the lowest score at the fall of third wicket from which any team went on to win in men's ODIs
Others: Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 35 runs
Mitchell Starc took 1 wicket for 31 runs
Steven Smith scored 46 runs for Australia
David Warner scored 41 runs for Australia
